item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, February 16, 2025 at 11:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Caddy – The Ultimate Server with Automatic HTTPS (400 points | 142 comments)
2. “A calculator app? Anyone could make that” (1093 points | 277 comments)
3. Show HN: Air Traffic Control Radio and Chill Music for Focus (51 points | 43 comments)
4. Google defends scrapping AI pledges and DEI goals in all-staff meeting (53 points | 12 comments)
5. Physicists uncover evidence of two arrows of time emerging at the quantum level (12 points | 3 comments)
6. Flea-Scope: $18 Source Available USB Oscilloscope, Logic Analyzer and More [pdf] (199 points | 72 comments)
7. Explaining my fast 6502 code generator (2023) (35 points | 5 comments)
8. Big Tech Has Disrupted the Social Contract (69 points | 23 comments)
9. Uchū · the color scheme for internet lovers (14 points | 5 comments)
10. Kindle is removing download and transfer option on Feb 26th (254 points | 149 comments)
11. United States Power Outage Map (221 points | 104 comments)
12. Root-inspired additive printing for fabricating robust conformal electronics (8 points | discuss)
13. Half-Life 2 and Dishonored art lead Viktor Antonov has died (282 points | 45 comments)
14. OpenVINO AI effects [denoising and transcription] for Audacity (96 points | 20 comments)
15. Critics say new Google rules put profits over privacy (48 points | 23 comments)
16. History 2701 Wiki (14 points | discuss)
17. Gold Is Worth More in New York (7 points | 9 comments)
18. Ask HN: What is the best method for turning a scanned book as a PDF into text? (109 points | 59 comments)
19. Vim after Bram: a core maintainer on how they've kept it going (171 points | 41 comments)
20. How Hans Bethe stumbled upon perfect quantum theories (60 points | 6 comments)
21. The Sims Game Design Documents (1997) (398 points | 56 comments)
22. Why is there a screen that says "It is now safe to turn off your computer"? (2016) (38 points | 32 comments)
23. Trick to find commands in the terminal quickly (44 points | 47 comments)
24. Finding Flow: Escaping digital distractions through deep work and slow living (164 points | 59 comments)
25. Portable drone jammer uses a Raspberry Pi tactical Software Defined Radio (43 points | 16 comments)
26. Beginnings of Roman London discovered in office basement (115 points | 26 comments)
27. Bombed Fresco: Using Math to Piece Together a Lost Treasure (2011) (8 points | 2 comments)
28. Langfuse (YC W23) Is Hiring Product Engineers in Berlin ( | hide)
29. Gixy: Nginx Configuration Static Analyzer (148 points | 27 comments)
30. Writing a Gimp 3.0 Plugin (147 points | 136 comments)
